titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that the committee for the militia of London shall have power to impose upon persons to finde arms, not exceeding three foot-souldiers for any one man: and to search for papists and suspitious persons, and to disarm them, and to raise horse.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that the committee for the militia of London shall have power to impose upon persons to finde arms, not exceeding three foot-souldiers for any one man: and to search for papists and suspitious persons, and to disarm them, and to raise horse.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of text.
Signed on t.p.: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D.Com.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
